message: ami Tamiru Millat kamil Madrasah main campus er 1 jon student.az 10.30 pm theke 1.45 am porjonto RAB amader hostele (465,mirhazirbagh,mayakanon,jatrabari) eshe tollashi chalaya 2 teacher shoho mot 13 jon ke atok korese.tader modde 3 jon alim porikkarti ase.shodo matro kiso boi (book) er opor vitte kore tader atok kora hoyese.RAB tader niye chole jabar por satroleag ra nashokota o lotpater chesta kore.Ekho amra khob atonke asi.
